long_description: The REI Salix jacket offers a girl a waterproof, breathable and insulated layer of protection for wet and cold adventures. 2-layer Elements(R) waterproof/breathable fabric is windproof to 60mph; fully sealed seams block out moisture. Quilted taffeta lining adds a layer of warmth. 3-panel hood, adjustable cuffs and dropped tail enhance protection and comfort. The REI Salix jacket features zippered hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket with internal media port. Waterproof front zipper and hand pocket zippers help keep moisture out.
short_description: The REI Salix jacket offers a girl a waterproof, breathable and insulated layer of protection for wet and cold adventures.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
